title: Kaspersky Anti-Hacker 1.5.0.119
description:
Kaspersky Anti-Hacker is the best firewall out there. 

This advanced firewall, for advanced users, will block the following hacking / destruction atempts: 
Ping Of Death 
LAND 
Scanning TCP Ports 
Scanning UDP Ports 
SYN Flood 
UDP Flood 
ICMP Flood 
Helkern 
SmbDie 
Lovesan 

It has stealth mode. 

It's in the medium range for &quot;ease&quot; and can be configured easily and quickly with practice. You might want to read the help file before installing. This can be found at www.kaspersky.com.
